Description Product reviews 0
Description
Abrasion resistant and easy to apply polyurethane elastomer film for protecting various blade,... more
Close menu
Product information "3M W8607 Wind Prot Tape Colorless Spl Free, 152mm x 38m"

Abrasion resistant and easy to apply polyurethane elastomer film for protecting various blade, tower, nacelle and hub assembly surfaces, such as logos and labels. Can be painted and applied over painted composites and metals. Available in various sizes: 102mm x 33m; 254mm x 33m, 152 x 33m. Further sizes upon request.

  • Highly resistant
  • Resistant to erosion and weather influences
  • UV-stable
  • Solvent free technology
  • 3M™ Windbreak tapes are made from an exceptionally hard, abrasion-resistant, transparent polyurethane elastomer and can significantly reduce and even eliminate leading edge erosion on wind turbine blades.

3M™ W8607 Wind Protection Tapes protect leading edges and surfaces from pitting, wear and water penetration. Made from rugged, abrasion-resistant polyurethane elastomers, 3M™ W8607 Wind Protection Tapes withstand punctures, tearing, erosion and weathering. They are UV-stable, solvent-free and adapt to complex shapes. Special assembly tools are not required. They can be easily applied at the factory or on site via access via ropes or platforms. These high-performance polyurethane adhesive tapes are applied to the leading edges of wind turbine blades and have been proven to contribute to turbine efficiency, reduce downtime and maintenance, and extend the life of turbine blades - even in the harshest environments.


Product data sheet 3M™ Wind Protection Tape W8607
3M™ Wind Protection Tape Application Instructions

Please also check out our accessories for 3M™ W8607 Wind Protection Tape.
